author: veithen
msg: Cleaned up some old code in the mail transport tests and make sure that mail folders are always properly closed.

msg: o added a new branch for storing provider configuraion on a consumer

author: davsclaus
msg: Removed @Converter on deprecated as it should not be picked up by Camel

author: kayyagari
msg: o refactored some variables and methods to match the corresponding schema elements
o updated the user configured attributes are handled
o added an option to store the cookie in file/DIT
o added support for storing the cookie in DIT
o removed cookie updating thread (cookie is now saved as soon as it is received)
o added support for handling network failures
